title: Ticket #3636: Do not hold DAGMan jobs on an upgrade from HTCondor version 7.8 -> 8.0
description:
I believe there will be problems on an upgrade from 7.8 -> 8.0 in the following scenario:

  1. A dagman job is put on hold
  2. The admin upgrades the schedd from 7.8 to 8.0
  3. The user releases the dagman job after the upgrade

Use this ticket as a place to point users to and to keep some wisdom about it when it does occur. I will be adding a note to the upgrade notes in the manual.

LIGO points out that condor_off -master -off causes DAGMan to shut down similar to a condor_hold and causes the same issue on upgrade from 7.8 to 8.0. Solution is to condor_rm all DAG jobs before upgrading.
